message.content:
I need to identify the cash payments made to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see that under "Cash Flow from Investing Activities," there is an item called:
- "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 1213417.20

This line item specifically represents the cash payments made to acquire property, plant and equipment (fixed assets), which are long-term assets. This is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1213417.20'} }
```
